strapiPost.title: NWA Schools Taking Top Spots For Best Schools In Arkansas
strapiPost.content:
Niche’s 2022 list of the best schools in the state is out, and Northwest Arkansas schools have the #1 spot in elementary, middle, and high schools. 

  • Top spot: Niche’s #1 Best Public Elementary School in Arkansas is Willowbrook Elementary School in Bentonville. The #1 for public middle schools is Bright Field Middle School in Bentonville. The #1 for public high schools is Haas Hall Academy in Fayetteville. 
  • Across the board: Haas Hall Academy in Fayetteville is #1 out of 280 in Arkansas. It is ranked as #1 in the Best Public High School Teachers category and the Best College Prep Public High School category as well. The #2 and #3 spots for best schools are all also NWA schools.
